metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4945 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Horde Internet Mail Program (IMP) before 6.1.8, as used in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.1.5, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an unspecified flag in the basic (1) mailbox or (2) message view.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-imp - 6.2.12-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-imp package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.12-1ubuntu1').
